title: LeaveBuster problems
body: I wait for leavebuster for 20 minutes and then the timer refresh and its again 20 minutes i had been waiting 40 minutes like this and it doesn't put me up to queue. Please help!

replies.body: Did you happen to have a screenshot showing where the timer had reset and also showing the total time waiting in the queue? We should be able to get that straightened out if I can see that it did in fact reset for some reason.
This has been happening to me as well I've done probably about 2 hours of leaver buster so far without being able to play a game, it's very frustrating
i've tried to restart the client, let's see if it work
I am blocked in this too... 1hours wasted for now.... Fck this :/
